name: noncentral
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
not in, at, from, or near the centre or most important part of something: The firm was unwilling to move its offices to a noncentral location. She has a non-central role in the organization. Related word
central
More examplesFewer examplesIt was a risk to start such a large business in a noncentral location.It emerged that our planet occupies a noncentral position in the universe.This atom occupies a non-central position in the molecule.Our non-central operations are looked after by another company.
